H0.text: Kylie Minogue played Charlene Robinson in what soap opera. Neighbours

H1.text: Kylie Minogue played Charlene Robinson in what soap opera. Home and Away

H2.text: Kylie Minogue played Charlene Robinson in what soap opera. Coronation Street

H3.text: Kylie Minogue played Charlene Robinson in what soap opera. Tazzle

A5.text: She first achieved recognition starring as Charlene Robinson in the Australian soap opera Neighbours (1986â€“1988).

A6.text: Charlene was introduced to the show along with several new characters, as part of a revamp by Network Ten to increase ratings.

A7.text: Minogue won four Logie Awards for her portrayal of Charlene, including the Gold Logie, becoming the youngest person to do so.
